LK_NET3.original: Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to send a picture to a contact.
From the menu scroll down and select ~h~Camera.~s~ Activate the camera by pressing ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~.
LK_NET3.translated: 在菜单中下移选中~h~相机。~s~按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~启动相机。

LK_NET3.original: ~r~Your cover is blown, you were seen.~s~
LK_NET3.translated: ~r~你的伪装暴露了，你被发现了。~s~

LK_NET3.original: ~r~You didn't answer Playboy's call.~s~
~r~Marlon got away.~s~
To take a picture with your phone you will need to access the phone's main menu. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ to activate the phone.
LK_NET3.translated: 从手机的主菜单中可以启动相机，按~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~拿出手机。

LK_NET3.original: The ~r~gang members~s~ are across the road, take a picture of them without getting too close and send it to Playboy.
LK_NET3.translated: ~r~混混们~s~正在过马路，拍张照发给Playboy，别靠他们太近。

LK_NET3.original: ~r~The target was not identified.~s~
~r~One of the gang members got away, it could have been Marlon.~s~

Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to move the camera. Zoom in and out using ~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to capture an image. When taking a photo of a person make sure you get a clear shot of their face.
LK_NET3.translated: 用~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~移动镜头，用~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~进行缩放。按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~拍照。拍人时确保能拍到脸。

LK_NET3.original: You are too far from the targets to obtain a clear shot.
LK_NET3.translated: 你离目标太远了，拍不清楚。

LK_NET3.original: Go to the ~y~basketball courts~s~ on Exeter Avenue.

Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to move the camera. Zoom in and out using ~PAD_RSTICK_UPDOWN~. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to capture an image. When taking a photo of a person make sure you get a clear shot of their face.
LK_NET3.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~移动相机，用~PAD_RSTICK_UPDOWN~进行缩放。按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~拍照。拍人时确保能拍到脸。

LK_NET3.original: Take a picture of the gang members and send it to Playboy. Don't get too close.
LK_NET3.translated: 拍一张混混团体的照片，发给Playboy。别靠得太近。

LK_NET3.original: Kill all the ~r~gang members.~s~
Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to capture an image on screen.
Once the picture has been sent, wait a short moment for a reply.
Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to select the phone's main menu.
Take down ~r~Marlon.~s~
Don't let ~r~Marlon~s~ get away. You have to take him out.
